Question: This person released her fourth studio album, In the Zone, in November 2003.
Hints: In December 2009, Billboard magazine ranked this person the 8th Artist of the 2000s decade in the United States.
In February 2006, pictures surfaced of this person driving with her son Sean, on her lap instead of in a car seat.
In October 2004, this person took a career break to start a family.
